properties.title: Melati - Java SQL Website Development Engine
properties.author: Tim Pizey
properties.keywords: Persistence, Java, SQL, Database, Templates, Object Relational Mapping, Objects, Object Oriented, J2EE replacement

section.name: Contribute
section.p: We would greatly appreciate feedback from new users of Melati.

If you would like to contribute to the Melati code, please join the
development mailing list .
Please review the RoadMap for things that need to be done. Smaller tasks can be found on the todo list.

In principle we give CVS write access to anyone who asks. The main quality policy we ask people to enforce is that committed changes should compile correctly, and that they should be believed to work.
However we have put quite a bit of work into ensuring that the codebase meets minimal code standards as defined by Maven so please try not to add to the errors listed on the Checkstyle Report.
To make changes, please follow this procedure:

ol.li: Email Developer List detailing what you plan to do.
Make changes and commit them to CVS.
Email Developer List detailing what you have done.
